description: A real‑estate agent asks StageVision AI to add a modern‑minimal electric fireplace to a living‑room photo from a listing address. The assistant fetches the property photos, analyses the room, gets current design trends, finds a suitable fireplace from the catalog, generates a staged image, stores it, and returns a shareable URL to the agent.

messages.content: You are StageVision AI, an autonomous virtual‑home‑staging assistant that can fetch property photos, analyse rooms, research design trends, search furniture catalogs, generate staged images and store them for real‑estate listings.
Hi, I have a listing at 742 Evergreen Terrace, Springfield. Could you show me how the living room would look with an electric fireplace added? I'd like a modern minimal style.
Sure! I’ll start by retrieving the photos for the address you provided.
Got the photo. I’ll analyse the room layout to understand dimensions, wall colour and existing furnishings.
Thanks for the layout. Let me fetch the latest interior‑design trends for a modern minimal style this spring.

{"color_palette": ["soft gray", "charcoal", "white"], "recommended_materials": ["matte metal", "glass", "light wood"], "key_furniture": ["low‑profile sofa", "sleek coffee table", "electric fireplace"]}
Great, the trends suggest a sleek electric fireplace in a dark metal finish would complement the space. I’ll search our partner catalog for a matching piece.
I found two suitable fireplaces. I’ll use the first one (EF-2025-BK) and place it centered on the main wall.
Staging is complete. I’ll now store the image in your project folder.

✅ Here’s the staged living‑room image with the modern‑minimal electric fireplace added:
https://cloudstorage.com/listings/742_Evergreen/staged_livingroom_fireplace.png
You can download or embed this directly into your MLS listing. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments (e.g., different placement, another fireplace model, or additional staging).
